message.heading: He's an idiot. Comes from upbringing. His parents are probably idiots, too. Lorraine, you ever have a kid who acts that way, I'll disown you.

message.heading: Anyway, your Grandpa hit him with the car and brought him into the house. He seemed so helpless, like a little lost puppy, and my heart just went out to him.

message.heading: Silence, Earthling. My name is Darth Vader. I am an extraterrestrial from the planet Vulcan!
